Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Character

    public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
implements Character
    The Enemy class that represents the bad guy in the game, The aim is to defeat the bad guys. When the bad guy succeeds in his attack the player loses life and eventually the player dies and game ends. When the Enemy dies, the players' score increases Created by Ankur on 4/24/2015.
